text: Lee Jae-wook (; born May 10, 1998) is a South Korean actor. He debuted as an actor in 2018 in the drama Memories of the Alhambra and gained succeeding major roles in Search: WWW and Extraordinary You. == Career == Lee Jae-wook started his acting career in 2018 with supporting roles for television drama Memories of the Alhambra as a hacker-programmer and The Battle of Jangsari film as a student soldier. In 2019, Lee acted as one of the main cast for tvN's Search: WWW and the second male lead for MBC's Extraordinary You as the female lead's childhood friend-fiancé. In 2020, Lee got a supporting role as Lee Jang-woo in the JTBC television series When The Weather Is Fine. In May of 2020, Lee was cast as the main male lead in the KBS2 television series Do Do Sol Sol La La Sol opposite of Go Ara. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !
